description: Registry of known manifests across Project Sanctuary. Maps sources to generated outputs for Protocol 130 deduplication.

.agent/learning/bootstrap_manifest.json.description: Onboarding context for fresh clones. Ingested via llm.md.

.agent/learning/guardian_manifest.json.description: Guardian bootloader context. Includes Identity Anchor and Primer.

.agent/learning/learning_audit/learning_.description: Cognitive Audit manifest (Protocol 130). Used for Red Team review.
Core context for Learning Audit (Merged into main manifest by Protocol 130 logic)

.agent/learning/red_team/red_team_manife.description: Red Team Audit manifest. Focuses on modified files and git diffs.

.agent/learning/manifest_registry.json.description: The Registry itself (Meta-manifest). Maps manifests to outputs.

forge/gguf_model_manifest.json.description: Forge LLM Model definitions (GGUF specs). Used by Forge pipeline.

hugging_face_dataset_repo/metadata/manif.description: Hugging Face dataset metadata. Used for Soul Persistence (ADR 079).

mcp_servers/lib/exclusion_manifest.json.description: Global file exclusion patterns (Protocol 130/128). Loaded by mcp_servers.lib.exclusion_config. Used by all snapshot tools.

mcp_servers/lib/ingest_manifest.json.description: Defines the 'Base Genome' (common_content). Used by capture_code_snapshot.py (default) and Forge.
